title: Riots new games
body: Will any of riots new games be ported to the nintendo switch?

replies.body:
With games like Overwatch coming to Switch it's entirely possible that Wild Rifts (the console/mobile version of League) will follow suit. No guarantees of course but certainly a possibility.

As for Teamfight Tactics and Legends of Runeterra, no news on console releases for those yet so hard to say. 

Runeterra especially would make a good candidate and most of the other mainstream card games are on or coming to console. TFT suits the mobile format much better, so may not see a console release.
